definition: face/side/surface/aspect/top/classifier for flat surfaces such as drums, mirrors, flags etc

sentences.english: His muddy slide onto the road.
sentences.chinese: 他在泥濘的路面上滑着走。

sentences.english: This kind of tyre is characteristic of nonskid stops on wet roads.
sentences.chinese: 這種輪胎的特點是在潮溼路面上不打滑。

sentences.english: The calculation methods of luminance and illuminance of road surface are discussed in detail.
sentences.chinese: 後又對計算路面亮度和照度的方法進行了詳細的討論。

sentences.english: The calculation results of road excitation show that the vibration characteristics of the mini-truck model are obviously improved.
sentences.chinese: 路面激勵的計算結果表明振動特性得到明顯改善。

sentences.english: You'll never be too careful as you drive on a ice-covered road.
sentences.chinese: 在結冰的路面上駕車時，怎麼小心都不爲過。

sentences.english: Through simulating test in the laboratory, further anti-skidding performance of exposed-aggregate cement concrete pavement was studied.
sentences.chinese: 針對露石水泥砼路面的抗滑性能進行研究。

sentences.english: It is worth popularizing as a new type undersurface layer gradation of asphalt pavement.
sentences.chinese: 是一種值得推廣的新型瀝青路面下面層級配。

sentences.english: While driving on the bumpy section of the road, he switches on the shock-absorbers.
sentences.chinese: 在路面不平的路段他開啓了減震器。

sentences.english: In china, the micro-surfacing is mostly used to bituminous pavement and cement concrete deck at present.
sentences.chinese: 在我國，微表處目前大多用於瀝青路面和水泥砼橋面。

sentences.english: We must check on guarantee of design and construction in road surface of cement concrete.
sentences.chinese: 對此應嚴把水泥混凝土路面的設計關和施工關。

sentences.english: Out feet slumped repeatedly through the melting ice.
sentences.chinese: 我們在凍冰的路面上走過，腳下打滑。

sentences.english: One key of road roughness recognition was feature extrication.
sentences.chinese: 路面不平度識別的關鍵之一是特徵提取。

sentences.english: I turned into the dirt road and followed it through encroaching trees and bushes.
sentences.chinese: 我轉上土路，在蔓延至路面的樹木和灌木間穿行。

sentences.english: My truck seemed to have no problem with the black ice that covered the roads.
sentences.chinese: 我的卡車似乎絲毫不受路面上那層黑冰的影響。

sentences.english: As the aluminum began to melt, it pooled off and ran off onto the roadway surface.
sentences.chinese: 鋁開始熔化成液體，然後彙集成流，在路面上流淌。

sentences.english: Results show that the recycling agent can heal the small fracture in asphalt road.
sentences.chinese: 再生養護劑可使瀝青路面上的細小裂縫基本癒合。

definition: to drive a vehicle/movement of vehicles
road condition(s) (e.g. surface, traffic flow etc)
to travel along a route (of vehicles etc)
